researchAreas.title: Web & Data Engineering
researchAreas.shortDescription: Building scalable web applications and data-intensive systems for the modern internet
researchAreas.fullDescription: Our research in Web & Data Engineering focuses on developing robust, scalable, and efficient systems for managing and processing large-scale data on the web. We explore semantic web technologies, knowledge graphs, linked data, and modern web architectures.

researchAreas.title: AI & Machine Learning
researchAreas.shortDescription: Advancing artificial intelligence through novel algorithms and real-world applications
researchAreas.fullDescription: We develop cutting-edge machine learning algorithms and AI systems that solve complex real-world problems. Our research spans supervised, unsupervised, and reinforcement learning, with applications in computer vision, natural language processing, and predictive analytics.

researchAreas.title: Big Data Analytics
researchAreas.shortDescription: Extracting insights from massive datasets using distributed computing and advanced analytics
researchAreas.fullDescription: Our Big Data Analytics research addresses the challenges of processing, analyzing, and extracting value from massive datasets. We develop scalable algorithms, distributed systems, and visualization techniques for handling big data in various domains.

researchAreas.title: Computational Optimization
researchAreas.shortDescription: Solving complex optimization problems using advanced mathematical and computational techniques
researchAreas.fullDescription: We develop and apply optimization algorithms to solve challenging real-world problems. Our research includes mathematical programming, metaheuristics, multi-objective optimization, and their applications in energy, logistics, and scheduling.

researchAreas.title: Sentiment Analysis & NLP
researchAreas.shortDescription: Understanding human language and emotions through computational linguistics
researchAreas.fullDescription: Our Natural Language Processing research focuses on understanding, generating, and analyzing human language. We specialize in sentiment analysis, opinion mining, text classification, and developing NLP tools for Greek and other languages.

researchAreas.title: Educational Technology & E-Learning
researchAreas.shortDescription: Transforming education through technology, data-driven personalization, and intelligent tutoring
researchAreas.fullDescription: We develop innovative educational technologies that enhance teaching and learning. Our research includes e-learning platforms, personalized learning systems, educational data mining, and AI-powered tutoring systems.
